comments: He passed away =(.. innalillahi wa inna ilahi rajiun.. he was the MOST flexible professor i have ever met.He cared for his students :) we all will miss you prof hyder ali =( RIP prof Ali.
He was the best proffesor that I ever had

Damn I have never seen a flexible professor like him. Whatever student ask he is agree. You ask for extension in the project he ll give u as much as u want. But want the things done perfectly. Perfection matters Attendance is mandatory. Really emphasis on project. Dont try to disappoint him and the whole class ll get benefit. Good explaining skill
